summary: FARMAI - An intelligent agriculture platform (React-only frontend) that provides crop prediction, cost estimation, profit calculation, and a farmer-to-buyer marketplace. Features a dashboard and website with dynamic functionality based on the provided requirements.
architectural_notes: React-only implementation (no Vite, Create React App or similar)
Color scheme based on provided reference images
Dashboard and public website as separate views/sections
Frontend-only with simulated data (no backend integration required)
Authentication system with role-based access (admin, farmer, buyer)

existing_features.title: Create a landing page with hero section introducing FARMAI as an intelligent agriculture platform, including sections for Problem Statement, Solution Overview, and Key Objectives as described in the project documentation

Build a crop prediction interface that accepts environmental and soil parameters (temperature, humidity, rainfall, pH, nitrogen, phosphorus, potassium) and displays AI-recommended crops with mock prediction logic

Create a cultivation cost estimation calculator that takes crop type, land area, and agricultural inputs (seeds, fertilizers, labor, irrigation, equipment) and calculates total estimated cost with itemized breakdown

Build a profit prediction calculator that accepts cultivation cost, expected yield (in quintals/kg), and market price per unit, then calculates and displays expected revenue, profit/loss, and profit margin percentage

Implement a farmer dashboard showing overview cards for total crops managed, estimated profits, active listings in marketplace, and quick access to crop prediction, cost estimation, and profit calculator tools

Create a direct marketplace interface where farmers can list crops for sale (crop name, quantity, price, location, contact) and buyers can browse available listings with search and filter capabilities
Implement navigation system with links to Home, Dashboard, Crop Prediction, Cost Calculator, Profit Calculator, and Marketplace sections, ensuring smooth routing between all pages

Apply a cohesive agricultural theme using earth tones (greens, browns, and warm neutrals) inspired by the reference images, with professional typography and consistent spacing throughout the application
Create a new authentication home page that serves as the landing page with three distinct login/signup options: Admin Login, Farmer Sign In/Sign Up, and Buyer Login/Sign Up
Implement Admin Login form with email/password fields and login button that authenticates admin users
Implement Farmer Sign In and Sign Up forms with email/password fields, allowing farmers to create new accounts or log into existing accounts
Implement Buyer Login and Sign Up forms with email/password fields, allowing buyers to create new accounts or log into existing accounts
Update the application routing so the new authentication page is the home route ('/') and the previous landing page content is moved to a different route or integrated appropriately
Implement session management to maintain user authentication state across page refreshes and provide logout functionality

new_feature_requests.summary: Profit prediction calculator with yield and market price inputs
Farmer dashboard showing key metrics and tools
Public website landing page with project overview
Render generated background images, agricultural icons, and crop illustrations as static assets from frontend/public/assets/generated directory
Add authentication system with admin login, farmer sign in/sign up, and buyer login/sign up as the home page
Create backend data structures and functions to store and manage user accounts with distinct user types (admin, farmer, buyer) including email, hashed password, and user role
